  • Classes in org.openremote.entities.panel used by org.openremote.entities.panel 
    Class and Description
    AbsoluteLayout
    Absolute layout that can contain one widget and is positioned relative to the top left of the containing screen.
    ButtonWidget.State 
    ButtonWidget.Type 
    CellLayout
    Cell layout used inside a grid layout; cell can contain one widget and is positioned within the grid by column, row, columnspan and rowspan properties
    Color
    A class for defining a color using RGB values
    CommandWidget
    Interface for widgets that need to send commands to the controller; at registration time the controller service will call setCommandSender the widget is responsible for calling commandSender.sendCommand when required.
    Gesture
    The screen gesture, which contains 4 swipe types: "top-to-bottom", "bottom-to-top", "left-to-right" and "right-to-left".
    Gesture.GestureType 
    GridLayout
    Grid layout that contains cells; grid is positioned relative to the top left of the containing screen
    Group
    Group is parsed by group node, which contains id, name, screens and tabBar.
    LabelWidget
    The label can set font size and color, and text can be linked to a sensor (i.e.
    Navigation
    Forwards to screen or do other logical functions.
    Navigation.SystemScreenType 
    NotifyPropertyChanged 
    ResourceChangedCallback
    Simple callback for notifying when a resource has changed
    ResourceConsumer
    Simple interface for defining a resource consumer (i.e.
    ResourceDataResponse
    Response object encapsulating resource data for a particular resource
    ResourceInfo
    This is a storage container for information about a named resource; depending on resource loading options the data may or may not get loaded initially.
    ResourceInfoDetails
    A simple wrapper for all details relating to a resource (excluding the actual binary data of the resource)
    ResourceLocator
    This interface defines the contract for retrieving resources from the controller; an instance is plugged into the panel resource consumers when the panel is registered with the controller.
    Screen
    Screen object that contains layouts and supports gestures
    ScreenBackground
    The background of screen, which contains background position in screen.
    ScreenBackground.RelativePosition 
    SensorLink
    Defines a link to a sensor and defines the to use
    SensoryWidget
    Base class for widgets that are capable of connecting to sensors.
    SliderWidget.State 
    SwitchState
    Switch State enum
    TabBar
    The tabBar contains any number of TabBarItem objects.
    TabBarItem
    Tab Bar Item can be used for navigation to other screens
    ValueSetFailureHandler
    Interface used for handling failures when trying to set a value of a widget property
    Widget
    Base class for all widgets.
    WidgetContainer
    Interface defining an object that can contain a widget
